channel.title: YOMA Stories
channel.description: Success stories and mission updates from the YOMA team

item.title: Our Mission to Empower Youth
item.description:
At YOMA, our mission is to empower young people to gain real-world skills, access learning opportunities, and earn rewards that unlock their full potential.

We’re driven by the belief that every young person deserves a chance to succeed.
item.dc:creator: YOMA Updates
item.content:encoded:
At YOMA, our mission is to empower young people to gain real-world skills, access learning opportunities, and earn rewards that unlock their full potential.

We’re driven by the belief that every young person deserves a chance to succeed.

item.title: Meet the Team Behind YOMA
item.description:
From developers and designers to youth engagement specialists — our team is passionate about creating technology that drives social change.

Learn more about the people making YOMA possible.
item.dc:creator: YOMA Updates
item.content:encoded:
From developers and designers to youth engagement specialists — our team is passionate about creating technology that drives social change.

Learn more about the people making YOMA possible.

item.title: Building Partnerships that Matter
item.description: Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. Discover how YOMA works with governments, organizations, and private partners to create opportunities for youth.
item.dc:creator: YOMA Updates
item.content:encoded: Collaboration is at the heart of everything we do. Discover how YOMA works with governments, organizations, and private partners to create opportunities for youth.

item.title: YOMA’s Journey So Far
item.description: From pilot projects to international collaborations, YOMA has grown into a platform that empowers thousands of young people across the globe.
item.dc:creator: YOMA Updates
item.content:encoded: From pilot projects to international collaborations, YOMA has grown into a platform that empowers thousands of young people across the globe.

item.title: Our Vision for the Future
item.description:
We believe in a future where young people have equal access to learning, earning, and growth opportunities—no matter where they come from.

Read how YOMA is shaping that future.
item.dc:creator: YOMA Updates
item.content:encoded:
We believe in a future where young people have equal access to learning, earning, and growth opportunities—no matter where they come from.

Read how YOMA is shaping that future.
